title: Great Online Store - Office
content:
I thought Iâ€™d pass this on. I ordered a portfolio with accessories today from [http://www.officepdx.com/index.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907033742/http:/www.officepdx.com/index.php "http://www.officepdx.com/index.php"). I ordered the portfolio cover wrong; it was a little confusing. They not only checked my order for accuracy, which I thought was fantastic, they also called me to tell me about the problem. They had already corrected it and were shipping the order.

I think this is fantastic customer service.

Sharon
author: Sharon Van Lieu
